rule: Each description must neglect artistic insight and provide imprecise imagery for the AI-generated photo.
input: A well-lit room with modern furniture and a large window.
coverage: A bright, well-lit modern room featuring sleek minimalist furniture in neutral tones, centered around a large window that allows abundant natural daylight to flood the space. Soft morning light casts gentle shadows, highlighting clean lines and contemporary design elements. The background showcases tasteful decor with simple, elegant accents and indoor greenery. The atmosphere is airy and tranquil, evoking a sense of calm and sophisticated comfort, perfect for a welcoming and stylish environment.
validityText:
The input "A well-lit room with modern furniture and a large window." meets all the specified criteria: it is a natural language description suitable for AI-generated photo prompts, contains fewer than 80 words, is written in English, and is presented as a single paragraph.

OK
